insert into inventory_field( inventory_field_guid, insurance_plan_id, field_id, last_year_crop_commodity_id, crop_year, planting_number, is_hidden_on_printout_ind, underseeded_crop_variety_id, underseeded_acres, underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date) values ( #{inventoryFieldGuid}, #{dto.insurancePlanId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.fieldId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.lastYearCropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.cropYear, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.plantingNumber, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.isHiddenOnPrintoutInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.underseededCropVarietyId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.underseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.underseededInventorySeededForageGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update inventory_field set insurance_plan_id = #{dto.insurancePlanId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, field_id = #{dto.fieldId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, last_year_crop_commodity_id = #{dto.lastYearCropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, crop_year = #{dto.cropYear, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, planting_number = #{dto.plantingNumber, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, is_hidden_on_printout_ind = #{dto.isHiddenOnPrintoutInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, underseeded_crop_variety_id = #{dto.underseededCropVarietyId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, underseeded_acres = #{dto.underseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid = #{dto.underseededInventorySeededForageGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where inventory_field_guid = #{dto.inventoryFieldGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}

update inventory_field set underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid = null, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid in ( select t.inventory_seeded_forage_guid from inventory_seeded_forage t where t.inventory_field_guid in ( select invf.inventory_field_guid from inventory_contract inv join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.contract_id = inv.contract_id and gcy.crop_year = inv.crop_year join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.grower_contract_year_id = gcy.grower_contract_year_id join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = cfd.annual_field_detail_id join inventory_field invf on invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = afd.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where inv.inventory_contract_guid = #{inventoryContractGuid} ) )

update inventory_field set underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid = null, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where field_id = #{fieldId} and underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid is not null

update inventory_field set underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid = null, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where field_id = #{fieldId} and crop_year = #{cropYear} and underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid is not null
mapper.delete: delete from inventory_field t where t.inventory_field_guid in (select invf.inventory_field_guid from inventory_contract inv join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.contract_id = inv.contract_id and gcy.crop_year = inv.crop_year join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.grower_contract_year_id = gcy.grower_contract_year_id join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = cfd.annual_field_detail_id join inventory_field invf on invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = afd.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where inv.inventory_contract_guid = #{inventoryContractGuid} )
mapper.select: , isf.crop_variety_id as linked_crop_variety_id , fcv.variety_name as linked_variety_name , isf.field_acres as linked_field_acres from inventory_field ifd left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = ifd.last_year_crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = ifd.underseeded_crop_variety_id left join inventory_seeded_forage isf on isf.inventory_seeded_forage_guid = ifd.underseeded_inventory_seeded_forage_guid left join crop_variety fcv on fcv.crop_variety_id = isf.crop_variety_id where ifd.field_id = #{fieldId} and ifd.crop_year = #{cropYear} and ifd.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId} order by ifd.planting_number, ifd.inventory_field_guid

from inventory_field ifd left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = ifd.last_year_crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = ifd.underseeded_crop_variety_id where ifd.field_id = #{fieldId} and ifd.crop_year = #{cropYear} and ifd.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId} and ( ( ifd.insurance_plan_id = 4 --Grain and ( exists (select 1 from inventory_seeded_grain isg where isg.inventory_field_guid = ifd.inventory_field_guid and isg.crop_commodity_id is not null and isg.seeded_acres > 0 ) or exists (select 1 from declared_yield_field dyf where dyf.inventory_field_guid = ifd.inventory_field_guid ) ) ) or ( ifd.insurance_plan_id = 5 --Forage and ( exists (select 1 from inventory_seeded_forage isf where isf.inventory_field_guid = ifd.inventory_field_guid ) or exists (select 1 from declared_yield_field dyf where dyf.inventory_field_guid = ifd.inventory_field_guid ) ) )
) order by ifd.planting_number, ifd.inventory_field_guid

-- All plantings for this field WITH plantings AS ( SELECT inv.inventory_field_guid, inv.field_id, inv.is_hidden_on_printout_ind FROM inventory_field inv WHERE inv.field_id = #{fieldId} AND inv.crop_year = #{cropYear} AND inv.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId} ) -- Only returns records if seeded acres > 0 exists for this field. SELECT p.field_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS planting_number, isg.crop_commodity_id AS last_year_crop_commodity_id, c.commodity_name AS last_year_crop_commodity_name, SUM(isg.seeded_acres) AS acres_to_be_seeded, -- Rollover for is_hidden_on_printout_ind is based on ALL plantings, -- not just those with seeded acres > 0. Set to Y if all plantings are Y, -- otherwise set to N. (SELECT MIN(all_p.is_hidden_on_printout_ind) FROM plantings all_p) AS is_hidden_on_printout_ind FROM plantings p JOIN inventory_seeded_grain isg ON isg.inventory_field_guid = p.inventory_field_guid LEFT JOIN crop_commodity c ON c.crop_commodity_id = isg.crop_commodity_id WHERE isg.seeded_acres > 0 GROUP BY p.field_id, isg.crop_commodity_id, c.commodity_name UNION -- Only returns if no seeded acres > 0 exists for this field. SELECT p.field_id, 1 AS planting_number, null AS last_year_crop_commodity_id, null AS last_year_crop_commodity_name, null AS acres_to_be_seeded, -- Set to Y if all plantings are Y, otherwise set to N. MIN(p.is_hidden_on_printout_ind) AS is_hidden_on_printout_ind FROM plantings p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM plantings p2 JOIN inventory_seeded_grain isg2 ON isg2.inventory_field_guid = p2.inventory_field_guid WHERE isg2.seeded_acres > 0) GROUP BY p.field_id ORDER BY planting_number

from inventory_field ifd left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = ifd.last_year_crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = ifd.underseeded_crop_variety_id where ifd.field_id = #{fieldId} order by ifd.crop_year, ifd.insurance_plan_id, ifd.planting_number, ifd.inventory_field_guid
